thread.title: MovieNews | Podcast: The Insider talks to Lisa Mulcahy, director of Red Rock and Legend of Longwood
thread.title_full: MovieNews | Podcast: The Insider talks to Lisa Mulcahy, director of Red Rock and Legend of Longwood - entertainment.ie

author: Brian Lloyd
title: MovieNews | Podcast: The Insider talks to Lisa Mulcahy, director of Red Rock and Legend of Longwood
text:
On this week's episode of The Insider, we talked to Lisa Mulcahy, one of the most in-demand directors working in Ireland today.
Her latest film, Legend of Longwood, is a live-action family adventure film about a young Irish-American girl who discovers a set of wild horses on the grounds of an old castle that hold mystical powers.
As well as feature film, Lisa is currently working on the next season of TV3's Red Rock. We talked working in both television and film, co-producing with Dutch filmmakers, the pressures of working in Irish television and the gender divide in directors.
